event_name: Rooted Youth Group: Rooted Youth Group

event.description:
Join us for a time of study in God's word and in fellowship with one another.
We meet on Wednesday evenings at 6:30pm in the youth room.  Just a reminder, we meet at Barton on the first Wednesday of every month for game time.
